text.0: moved indraagni by our hymn come to the juice the precious dew.
text.1: drink ye thereof impelled by song.
text.2: o indraagni with the man who lauds you comes the wakening rite.
text.3: so drink ye both this juice assured.
text.4: through force of sacrifice i choose indraagni who love the wise.
text.5: with soma let these sate them here.
text.6: indra and agni i invoke jointvictors bounteous unsubdued.
text.7: foeslayers best to win the spoil.
text.8: indra and agni singers skilled in melody hymn you bringing lauds.
text.9: i choose you for the sacred food.
text.10: indra and agni ye cast down the ninety forts which dāsas held.
text.12: to indraagni reverent thoughts go forward from the holy task.
text.13: along the path of sacred law.
text.14: o indraagni powers are yours and dwellings and delightful food.
text.15: good is your readiness to act.
text.16: indra and agni in your deeds of might ye deck heavens lucid realms.
text.17: famed is that hero strength of yours.
